verse: अथ यदि मातृलोककामो भवति संकल्पादेवास्य मातरः समुत्तिष्ठन्ति तेन मातृलोकेन संपन्नो महीयते॥

terms.मातृलोककामो (mātṛloka: kāmo) - Desirous of the mother's world

meaning: Meaning:Now, if one desires the world of the mother, just by the intention/will of becoming so, the mothers arise because of that person. Therefore, having obtained the world of the mother, one becomes great/esteemed.
